attributes.action: intervene to stop the St. Neot, Cornwall Post Office from closing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The village and parish of St. Neot, Cornwall requests that the Prime Minister intervenes to stop the closure of our Post Office.  St Neot's Post Office is outside the Government's stated criteria. If only half the population of the village travels by car to the nearest Post Office once per week this will create an additional 150,000 carbon miles every year, again contrary to Government targets
